Title: Home Again
Writer: Jennifer Ames, Steve Turner, Sam Raimi (based on characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Lucy Lawless
Plot: Ash, distraught about losing Pablo is determined to bring him back. Ruby and Kelly tag along as they travel back in time to make sure Young Ash never sees the Necronomicon.
